seed_pair.target: Disfruto hacer cosas interesantes con mis amigos.
seed_pair.known: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

S0041: Me siento bien, pero estoy comenzando a sentirme cansado.
I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.
S0042: Estaba comenzando a sentirme mejor que anoche.
I was starting to feel better than last night.
S0043: No estaba pensando en cómo responder.
I wasn't thinking about how to answer.
S0044: Or if I need to improve.
S0045: I don't need to know everything.
S0046: Pero no me preocupo por hacer errores.
But I don't worry about making mistakes.
S0047: Porque pienso que es una cosa buena hacer errores.
Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
S0048: I don't care about making mistakes.
S0049: Es así, si sabes lo que quiero decir.
It's like this, if you know what I mean.
S0050: No estoy intentando terminar lo más rápidamente posible.
I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
